panels.title: Meet Samsung People
panels.sub: Whatever you're looking for on Samsung.com, Samsung People are here to help you make the right choice. Enjoy live video demos and get expert advice, all from the comfort of home.

panels.title: Introducing the new Galaxy Books
panels.sub: Get up close and personal with the powerful and versatile Galaxy Book Pro 360 with Super AMOLED screen, and the ultra-thin and portable Galaxy Book Pro, offering smartphone-like mobility.**

text: Every day at 8pm. Friday 14th to Wednesday 19th May (excluding Sunday).

Join us for an interactive demonstration of the new Galaxy Book, Galaxy Book Pro and Galaxy Book Pro 360, live from Samsung KX. Ask our experts questions and get an exclusive discount code to use on Samsung.com.*

*Purchase from Samsung Shop Online until 31/5/21. Cannot be used in conjunction with any other offer code. Available on the new Galaxy Book Pro and Galaxy Book Pro 360. Limited availability only. T&Cs apply.
**Based on laptop with 11th Gen Intel® Core™ Processor and Intel® Evo™ Platform as of May 2021.

items.title: Watch Samsung People Live: Galaxy 21 Range
